item.title: 即使物价居高不下，非洲经济前景依然光明
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）表示，非洲的经济前景有所改善，但也面临着各种风险，从美元重新崛起到致命的干旱，这些风险给非洲已经经受的 "残酷鸡尾酒式 "冲击雪上加霜。【原文：Africa’s economic outlook has brightened but is facing risks that stretch from a resurgent dollar to deadly droughts that add to a “brutal cocktail” of shocks it has already endured, the IMF said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）考虑增加向赞比亚提供的资金以帮助其应对干旱紧急情况
item.description: 赞比亚正遭受有史以来最严重的旱灾，国际货币基金组织正在与赞比亚谈判，以增加对该国的融资。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is in talks with Zambia to boost financing for the country that’s suffering the impacts of its worst drought on record, just as it emerges from a painfully slow debt restructuring process.】

item.title: 纽约梅隆财富首席信息官：买入比套现更好
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（BNY Mellon）财富管理部门首席投资官辛妮-科尔顿-格兰特（Sinead Colton Grant）表示，美国股市从上月底创下的历史高点回落，为持有现金的投资者提供了买入的机会。【原文：The US stock market’s retreat from all-time highs set late last month is giving investors parked in cash an opening to buy in, according to Sinead Colton Grant, chief investment officer of BNY Mellon’s wealth management arm.】

item.title: 欧洲央行顶住压力坚持对银行分红的强硬立场
item.description: 在强硬派和新任监事会主席克劳迪娅-布赫（Claudia Buch）的力挺下，高级监管机构软化欧洲央行对贷款机构分红和股票回购立场的努力正在动摇。【原文：A bid by senior regulators to soften the European Central Bank’s stance on lenders’ dividends and share buybacks is faltering amid pushback from hardliners and new Supervisory Board Chair Claudia Buch.】

item.title: 美联储的不确定性给加拿大银行的麦克尔姆带来束缚
item.description: 加拿大央行越来越接近降息，但在没有得到美联储更明确信号的情况下，加拿大央行降息的幅度和速度是有限的。【原文：The Bank of Canada is getting closer to cutting interest rates, but there are limits to how far and how fast it can move without getting a clearer sign from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 中国承诺支持知名企业在香港上市
item.description: 中国证券监管机构表示，将鼓励中国公司在香港上市，并公布了一系列措施，以加强香港作为国际金融中心的地位。【原文：China’s securities regulator said it will encourage listings by the nation’s companies in Hong Kong as it unveiled a package of measures to bolster the city’s position as an international financial hub.】

item.title: 对俄罗斯金属的制裁将考验其史诗级铁路的极限
item.description:
莫斯科官员已转向东方。事实证明，调整该国庞大的物流网络更加困难。【原文：

Moscow officials have turned east. Adapting the country’s vast logistics networks is proving harder.

】

item.title: 哈德逊湾完成 8 亿美元基金，押注特殊情况投资
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，哈德逊湾资本管理公司（Hudson Bay Capital Management）已经筹集了 8 亿多美元，用于投资所谓的特殊机会。【原文：Hudson Bay Capital Management has raised over $800 million to invest in so-called special opportunities, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 快闪族 "放弃欢乐时光，与国际象棋大师一较高下
item.description: 华尔街的后起之秀们聚集的地方不是开放式酒吧，而是摆放着棋盘的桌子。【原文：The up-and-comers of Wall Street gathered not around an open bar, but tables with chess boards.】

item.title: 似曾相识的厄瓜多尔投票考验新兴市场债券反弹之巅
item.description: 今年新兴市场的最佳涨势取决于一个人的受欢迎程度：丹尼尔-诺沃亚（Daniel Noboa），36 岁的香蕉产业继承人。【原文：The best rally in emerging markets this year hinges on the popularity of one person: Daniel Noboa, the 36-year-old heir to a banana fortune.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克十年来首次涉足欧元债券以外的领域
item.description: 斯洛伐克债务机构负责人表示，斯洛伐克十年来首次利用欧元区以外的债务市场，并计划进一步发行瑞士法郎，也可能发行美元。【原文：Slovakia tapped a debt market beyond its own euro region for the first time in a decade and plans further issuance in Swiss francs and possibly the dollar, the head of the nation’s debt agency said.】

item.title: TDR Capital 收购亿万富翁所持英国阿斯达公司股份的交易即将达成
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，TDR Capital 正在接近达成收购加油站亿万富翁祖伯-伊萨（Zuber Issa）在阿斯达（Asda）所持股份的交易，这家私人股权投资公司正在加强对英国最大连锁超市之一的控制。【原文：TDR Capital is closing in on a deal to buy gas-station billionaire Zuber Issa’s stake in Asda as the private-equity firm tightens its grip on one of Britain’s biggest supermarket chains, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 电动汽车芯片制造商错失人工智能反弹后考验投资者信心
item.description: 电动汽车市场的萎靡正在拖累为汽车生产芯片的公司股价，而这些公司在人工智能领域的投资有限，使其无法参与更广泛的反弹。但分析师呼吁长期投资者保持信心。【原文：A waning electric vehicle market is dragging down shares of companies making chips for automobiles, with their limited exposure to AI excluding them from a broader rally. But analysts are urging long-term investors to keep the faith.】

item.title: 中东 "刀尖 "上的石油考验央行官员的神经
item.description: 对地缘政治忧心忡忡的全球央行行长们一夜之间又被猛然提醒，中东对他们的通胀斗争构成了潜在威胁。【原文：Global central bankers fretting about geopolitics just got another sharp reminder overnight about the potential threat that the Middle East poses to their inflation fight.】

item.title: 利率够高吗？美联储重置降息时钟
item.description: 一连串令人失望的通胀数据迫使美联储重新设定首次降息的时间，并重新评估物价增长的轨迹。【原文：A string of disappointing inflation data has forced the Federal Reserve to reset the clock on its first interest-rate cut and re-evaluate the trajectory of price growth.】

item.title: 西姆库斯称欧洲央行可能在夏季连续降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，如果欧元区的通货紧缩比预期的要严重，欧洲中央银行可能会在 6 月和 7 月降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank could lower borrowing costs in both June and July, should disinflation in the euro zone be stronger than anticipated, Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus said.】

item.title: 拜登的火热经济引发世界其他地区对货币的担忧
item.description: 本周，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在宾夕法尼亚州的竞选连任之旅中称赞美国经济蓬勃发展，是世界上最强劲的经济。【原文：As Joe Biden this week hailed America’s booming economy as the strongest in the world during a reelection campaign tour of battleground-state Pennsylvania, global finance chiefs convening in Washington had a different message: cool it.】

item.title: 软银支持的奥约公司希望出售 4.5 亿美元债券用于再融资
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士透露，Oyo Hotels 正在洽谈通过美元债券融资最多 4.5 亿美元的事宜，因为这家一度高歌猛进的印度初创企业正寻求在股市首次亮相延迟的情况下，替换现有的高成本贷款。【原文：Oyo Hotels is in talks to raise up to $450 million via dollar bonds, a person familiar with the matter said, as the once-high-flying Indian startup seeks to replace an existing high-cost loan amid delays in its stock-market debut.】

item.title: 外商对华投资下降 增长前景蒙阴
item.description: 与去年同期相比，3 月份外商对华投资连续第三个月放缓，这凸显出中国政府在努力吸引更多海外资金以促进经济发展。【原文：Foreign investment into China slowed for a third straight month in March compared to the same period last year, underscoring Beijing’s struggle to attract more overseas funds to boost its economy.】

item.title: 中东纷争扰乱市场，亚洲加强货币防卫
item.description: 从雅加达到首尔，各国央行都加强了对本国货币的保护，因为亚洲与重新崛起的美元的斗争面临着来自中东武装冲突报道的新挑战。【原文：Central banks from Jakarta to Seoul intensified the defense of their currencies, as Asia’s struggle against a resurgent dollar faced a fresh challenge from reports of armed conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 马来西亚资产抵御中东忧虑引发的大跌
item.description: 周五，在新兴市场普遍下挫的情况下，马来西亚的资产仍表现出对该国经济前景的乐观态度，而且市场猜测马来西亚将获得当地基金的支持。【原文：Malaysia’s assets defied a broad selloff in emerging markets on Friday amid optimism surrounding the nation’s economic outlook and speculation of support from local funds.】

item.title: 可可产量创下新纪录，北美碾磨量超出预期
item.description: 纽约可可期货创下新纪录，原因是尽管全球供应紧张，价格创下新高，但巧克力工厂的加工速度仍在加快。【原文：Cocoa futures in New York touched a fresh record as the pace of processing in chocolate factories holds up despite a global supply crunch and record prices.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行行长誓言 "不惜一切代价 "应对通货膨胀
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，土耳其央行行长法提赫-卡拉汉（Fatih Karahan）承诺将 "不惜一切代价 "抑制通货膨胀，并表示如有必要将进一步收紧银根。【原文：Turkish central bank Governor Fatih Karahan promised to do “whatever it takes” to curb inflation and signaled further monetary tightening if needed, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 债券 "越久越高"，5%收益率重回视野
item.description: 欢迎收看《每周定调》（Weekly Fix），我们坚信降息会在某时某地到来。我是彭博亚洲市场直播团队负责人加菲尔德-雷诺兹（Garfield Reynolds）。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that’s confident rate cuts are coming sometime, somewhere. I’m Garfield Reynolds, Bloomberg’s Markets Live team leader in Asia.】

item.title: 德意志银行在亚洲私人银行业务改革中裁员数十人
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）过去一周在亚洲裁减了 10 个私人银行职位，这是继最近几个季度数十次裁员之后的又一次裁员，因为德意志银行将目光投向了利润更高的市场，并剔除了表现不佳的客户。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG trimmed 10 private banking roles in Asia over the past week, adding to dozens of cuts in recent quarters as it zooms in on more profitable markets and weeds out underperformers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 以色列就报道的伊朗袭击是否发出了足够强烈的信息展开辩论
item.description: 以色列官方对周五报道的袭击伊朗事件保持沉默，以色列的分析师和官员就袭击的规模是强势还是弱势的标志发表了看法。【原文：As Israel maintained official silence on Friday’s reported attack on Iran, its analysts and officials weighed in on whether the scale of the assault was a sign of strength or weakness.】

item.title: 今年上涨 6.4% 后桥水增持中国股票和债券
item.description: 桥水联合基金公司（Bridgewater Associates）的中国在岸对冲基金正在增加对本地股票和债券的投资，此前风险资产的反弹将第一季度的回报率提升至 6.4%，超过了大多数本地竞争对手。【原文：Bridgewater Associates’ onshore China hedge fund is adding exposure to local stocks and bonds after a rally in risk assets boosted returns in the first quarter to 6.4%, beating most local rivals.】

item.title: 美国银行策略师称利率焦虑加剧股票外流
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，由于美国经济强劲、通胀持续高企，加剧了市场对美联储将在更长时间内维持较高利率的担忧，投资者正在将资金撤出股票市场。【原文：Investors are pulling money out of equities as a strong US economy and sticky inflation fuel concerns that the Federal Reserve will keep interest rates higher for longer, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 在避险需求的推动下，新兴市场股市将迎来两年来最糟糕的一周
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势升级刺激了投资者的避险需求，黄金和石油价格上涨，新兴市场股市和货币周五走软。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies weakened on Friday as the escalation of tension in the Middle East spurred safe-haven demand among investors, sending gold and oil prices higher.】
